N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 386.5 - Training expenditures in excess of $5,000

State Regulations

Before a social services district may enter into a
contract for training or incur a noncontractual training expenditure in excess
of $5,000, the social services district shall submit the proposed contract, or
in the absence of a contract, a written request to the department for review
and approval. The department shall approve or disapprove the proposed training
expenditure within 30 days of receipt of such contract or request, and shall
notify the district in writing of the department's decision. If the training
expenditure is disapproved, the written notice shall inform the district of the
reasons for disapproval. The written approval of the department shall be a
condition precident to receiving State reimbursement for the training
expenditures. Notes
